title: Update contact details in Contact section and footer

requirements.summary: Replace placeholder Contact section business details with the provided ML Enterprise address, phone, and email while keeping Business Hours unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/components/site/sections/ContactSection.tsx`, the 'Location', 'Phone', and 'Email' cards display the provided address/phone/email instead of placeholders.
Business Hours remains unchanged unless explicitly provided otherwise.
All user-facing text remains in English.

file_operations.description:
Update the `contactInfo` entries for 'Location', 'Phone', and 'Email' to exactly:
- Address: "Tongdentsuyong Ward, A.M Road, Mokokchung, Nagaland 798601"
- Phone: "9366012115"
- Email: "mlenterprisemkg@gmail.com"
Keep the existing Business Hours card content unchanged and ensure all displayed text remains in English.

requirements.summary: Update footer contact details to match the provided address, phone, and email without causing mobile layout overflow.
acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/components/site/SiteFooter.tsx`, the Contact list shows the provided address, phone, and email instead of the current placeholders.
Footer continues to render without layout overflow on mobile widths.

file_operations.description:
Replace the footer Contact list placeholder values with the exact provided:
- "Tongdentsuyong Ward, A.M Road, Mokokchung, Nagaland 798601"
- "9366012115"
- "mlenterprisemkg@gmail.com"
Preserve the existing business hours line. Add/adjust Tailwind utility classes on the contact list items (e.g., enabling wrapping like `break-words` / `whitespace-normal`) as needed to prevent overflow on narrow/mobile widths while keeping content in English.
